about_the_game:
This is a companion app for the board game Warcrow Adventures, by Corvus Belli. The use of this app is absolutely mandatory in order to play the game.

Warcrow Adventures is a cooperative fantasy dungeon crawler for 4 players. Throughout the game, you will become the protagonist of a unique tactical and narrative story, join your teammates and venture to Hawthorn Point to try to overcome its challenges!

This game combines tactical and action gameplay with a deep focus on narrative. Throughout the game, you will interact with other characters, learn their stories, talk to NPCs... as well as explore different scenarios, fight a range of different enemies and thrive as the story unfolds.

The use of this app is absolutely mandatory to play Warcrow Adventures. This application will guide you through the campaigns that make up the game, managing the events that will occur during the game, the behaviour of enemies, the items earned or the interaction with other NPCs, as well as many other functions. It will also allow you to save the game and continue in a different game session.
